entry.name: Authorizing Agent
entry.value: This is the person with authority to verify a registrant, and to certify the role to be assigned to that registrant. For example, a PAO is the authorizing agent for all users within that country -- FSNs, foreign service, and civil service.

entry.name: Control
entry.value: Controls are interactive elements on webpages, or other graphical user interfaces, that allow you to input data, select an action, open a link, change a display, etc.
